General.Name: SMNX
General.Description:
The Solomon exchange is a user-friendly application where users can buyi and sell cryptocurrencies through their bank accounts and more. The Solomon Exchange is backed by strong algorithmic mechanism to give users a choice among best cryptocurrency exchanges in the world. 

The Solomon Exchange token is an Ethereum-based asset used to pay fees on the Solomon Exchange Local platform. These tokens are also be used to distribute dividends to token holders.

ICO.Description:
The Solomon exchange is a user-friendly application where users can buyi and sell cryptocurrencies through their bank accounts and more. The Solomon Exchange is backed by strong algorithmic mechanism to give users a choice among best cryptocurrency exchanges in the world.

The Solomon Exchange token is an Ethereum-based asset used to pay fees on the Solomon Exchange Local platform. These tokens are also be used to distribute dividends to token holders.

 Team:

  • Jessica Mc'Carty: UI-UX Desinger
  • Paul Daniels: Codex Developer
  • Andy Williams: Project Manager
  • Taylor Wales: Beta Tester.

SOLOMON EXCHANGE will be holding its ICO on 28th August, 2017. The ICO token supply represents  60% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 15 million tokens available, for USD 1 (ETH and BTC) each at the offering. The ICO funding target is $9 million, the funding cap is $15 million and is expected to end on 27th September, 2017, or when the funding cap is reached. Any unsold/remaining tokens will be destroyed.

Token Reserve Split (40%):

  • 40% To be held by the Company

The SMNX ICO featues a bonus campaign.

Bonus Structure:

  • 20% First 3 days
  • 15% next 7 days
  • 10% next 7 days
